name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinKapture - LinkedIn Exports & AI Analyzer for Recruiters and Sales

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly Analyze & Export LinkedIn Profiles to Google Sheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinKapture is your companion for faster sourcing and prospecting on LinkedIn.

- Save/Update profiles in your Google Sheets
- Use our AI Profile Analyzer to check candidates' fit
- Find out specific keywords in a profile in just a glance
- Find out about companies without leaving a profile
- Get the email of any profile with our integration of Apollo.io
- Quick overview of your push activity

https://docs.linkapture.com/releases
